summary: Make a start of your HTML Website
param: Description of Website (Search Engines using it as description)

OPTIONS are "ALL" as default it allowing to index your website in search engines | "NOINDEX" Search engines will not can index your site | "NOFOLLOW" Search engines will not follow by hyperlinks to your another pages | "NONE" Search Engines will not can index your site
Language of site (in notation ISO 639-1 f.e. "pl")
When you last modified this file? (in notation "D, d M Y H:i:s GMT"| you can use PHP function gmdate("D, d M Y H:i:s", filemtime($SCRIPT_FILENAME)) . " GMT");)
returns: Nothing just "echo"-ing HEAD section with opening html tag
